name: picgo-plugin-pic-migrater
description: A PicGo plugin for pictures in markdown files migrating from one picBed to another one.

scripts.patch: npm version patch && git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.minor: npm version minor && git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.major: npm version major && git push origin master && git push origin --tags

author: Molunerfinn
